DOC.brief_summary: A retrospective case control study to validate the association between Interleukin-1 gene variations and adult chronic periodontal disease in Chinese (Taiwan).
DOC.brief_title: Genetics of Periodontal Diseases in Chinese (Taiwan)
DOC.criteria: To be included in this study, an individual needs to be Han Chinese of 35 years of age or older at time of enrollment. Subjects who, at time of enrollment, were pregnant or breastfeeding, or needed antibiotic prophylaxis before periodontal treatment will be excluded from this study.
